TransferParameters TransferParameters Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataLake.Store
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.DataLake.Store.dll

Represents parameters for the DataLakeStoreTransferClient.

Constructors

TransferParameters(String, String, String, Int32, Int32, Boolean, Boolean, Boolean, Boolean, Boolean, Int64, String) TransferParameters(String, String, String, Int32, Int32, Boolean, Boolean, Boolean, Boolean, Boolean, Int64, String)

Edit

Creates a new set of parameters for the DataLakeStoreTransferClient.

public TransferParameters(string inputFilePath, string targetStreamPath, string accountName, int perFileThreadCount = -1, int concurrentFileCount = -1, bool isOverwrite = false, bool isResume = false, bool isBinary = true, bool isRecursive = false, bool isDownload = false, long maxSegmentLength = 268435456L, string localMetadataLocation = null)Public Sub New(inputFilePath As String, targetStreamPath As String, accountName As String, perFileThreadCount As Integer = -1, concurrentFileCount As Integer = -1, isOverwrite As Boolean = False, isResume As Boolean = False, isBinary As Boolean = True, isRecursive As Boolean = False, isDownload As Boolean = False, maxSegmentLength As Long = 268435456L, localMetadataLocation As String = Nothing)
Parameters
inputFilePath
String String

The full path to the file or folder to be transferred.

targetStreamPath
String String

The full stream path where the file or folder will be transferred to.

accountName
String String

Name of the account to transfer to.

perFileThreadCount
Int32 Int32

The per file thread count, indicating the number of file segments to transfer in parallel. This number is capped at FILE_SIZE/maxSegmentLength for optimal performance.

concurrentFileCount
Int32 Int32

The parallel file count, indicating the number of files to transfer in parallel during a folder transfer. This parameter is ignored for single file transfers. Default is 5 for folder transfers

isOverwrite
Boolean Boolean

(Optional) Whether to overwrite the target stream or not.

isResume
Boolean Boolean

(Optional) Indicates whether to resume a previously interrupted transfer.

isBinary
Boolean Boolean

(Optional) Indicates whether to treat the input file as a binary file (true), or whether to align transfer blocks to record boundaries (false).

isRecursive
Boolean Boolean

(Optional) Indicates whether to transfer the source folder recursively or not. If true, will transfer the source directory and all sub directories, preserving directory structure.

isDownload
Boolean Boolean

(Optional) if set to true [is download] instead of an transfer scenario. Default is false.

maxSegmentLength
Int64 Int64

Maximum length of each segment. The default is 256mb, which gives optimal performance. Modify at your own risk.

localMetadataLocation
String String

(Optional) Indicates the directory path where to store the local transfer metadata file while the transfer is in progress. This location must be writeable from this application. Default location: SpecialFolder.LocalApplicationData.

Properties

AccountName AccountName

Edit

Gets a value indicating the name of the account to transfer to or download from.

public string AccountName { get; }Public ReadOnly Property AccountName As String
Value
String String

The name of the account.

ConcurrentFileCount ConcurrentFileCount

Edit

Gets the parallel file count, which indicates how many files in a folder will be transferred or downloaded in parallel

public int ConcurrentFileCount { get; }Public ReadOnly Property ConcurrentFileCount As Integer
Value
Int32 Int32

The number of files to transfer or download at once.

Delimiter Delimiter

Edit

Gets a value indicating the record boundary delimiter for the file, if any.

public string Delimiter { get; }Public ReadOnly Property Delimiter As String
Value
String String

The record boundary delimiter

FileEncoding FileEncoding

Edit

Gets a value indicating the encoding of the file being transferred.

public Encoding FileEncoding { get; }Public ReadOnly Property FileEncoding As Encoding
Value
Encoding Encoding

The file encoding.

InputFilePath InputFilePath

Edit

Gets a value indicating the full path to the file or folder to be transferred.

public string InputFilePath { get; }Public ReadOnly Property InputFilePath As String
Value
String String

The input file path.

IsBinary IsBinary

Edit

Gets a value indicating whether the input file should be treated as a binary (true) or a delimited input (false).

public bool IsBinary { get; }Public ReadOnly Property IsBinary As Boolean
Value
Boolean Boolean

true if this instance is binary; otherwise, false.

IsDownload IsDownload

Edit

Gets a value indicating whether this instance is downloading to the local machine instead of transfering.

public bool IsDownload { get; }Public ReadOnly Property IsDownload As Boolean
Value
Boolean Boolean

true if this instance is download; otherwise, false.

IsOverwrite IsOverwrite

Edit

Gets a value indicating whether to overwrite the target stream if it already exists.

public bool IsOverwrite { get; }Public ReadOnly Property IsOverwrite As Boolean
Value
Boolean Boolean

true if this instance is overwrite; otherwise, false.

IsRecursive IsRecursive

Edit

Gets a value indicating whether the folder transfer should recursively transfer the source folder. This is only valid for folder transfers and will be ignored for file transfers.

public bool IsRecursive { get; }Public ReadOnly Property IsRecursive As Boolean
Value
Boolean Boolean

true if this instance is recursive; otherwise, false.

IsResume IsResume

Edit

Gets a value indicating whether to resume a previously interrupted transfer.

public bool IsResume { get; }Public ReadOnly Property IsResume As Boolean
Value
Boolean Boolean

true if this instance is resume; otherwise, false.

LocalMetadataLocation LocalMetadataLocation

Edit

Gets a value indicating the directory path where to store the metadata for the transfer.

public string LocalMetadataLocation { get; }Public ReadOnly Property LocalMetadataLocation As String
Value
String String

The local metadata location.

MaxSegementLength MaxSegementLength

Edit

Gets the maximum length of each segement.

public long MaxSegementLength { get; }Public ReadOnly Property MaxSegementLength As Long
Value
Int64 Int64

The maximum length of each segement.

PerFileThreadCount PerFileThreadCount

Edit

Gets a value indicating the maximum number of parallel threads to use for a single file transfer or download.

public int PerFileThreadCount { get; }Public ReadOnly Property PerFileThreadCount As Integer
Value
Int32 Int32

The file thread count.

TargetStreamPath TargetStreamPath

Edit

Gets a value indicating the full stream path where the file will be transferred to.

public string TargetStreamPath { get; }Public ReadOnly Property TargetStreamPath As String
Value
String String

The target stream path.
